title: Gridiron Tech Tags Players, Delving Deeper Into The Game's Data
teaser: Something new is coming to the NFL this year: high-tech tracking devices on players. In some stadiums, they'll give teams and TV audiences real-time readouts of player movements. They'll also give coaches tons of data to fine-tune their game plans.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
